name: prisma-article-example
description: <<Prisma: 下一代ORM, 不仅仅是ORM>> Demo 仓库

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run init
scripts.init: npm run init:single && npm run init:multi && npm run init:advanced
scripts.init:single: cd dist/single-model && prisma db push --preview-feature && prisma generate
scripts.init:multi: cd dist/multi-models && prisma db push --preview-feature && prisma generate
scripts.init:advanced: cd dist/multi-models-advanced && prisma db push --preview-feature && prisma generate
scripts.invoke: npm run invoke:single && npm run invoke:multi && npm run invoke:advanced

author: linbudu599
